name: Partnering Hope Into Action Foundation

address: D25/D, S.J.House, South Extension Part II

briefDescription: Partnering Hope Into Action Foundation was registered as a charitable trust in December 2005, to assist, facilitate and promote humanitarian work irrespective of gender, caste, class, ethnicity, religion, color, culture and physical abilities. Our focus is on poor, socially excluded and marginalised communities in India. We believe in sustainable development and work closely with civil society and community-based organisations (CSOs and CBOs) to eradicate poverty and exclusion. Phia Foundation envisions a world where everyone, regardless of caste, class, culture, religion and gender, can live a life free from poverty.

address: Flat A-402, Nanda Devi Apartments, Pocket 19, Sector 10,
